column4: when i try to 'sudo mount /dev/sdb1' (which is my flash drive) it just tells me "mount: can't find /dev/sdb1 in /etc/fstab or /etc/mtab" how do i mount it with superuser privileges?
You have to give it a mount point where it shall mount the device
It should be something like mount /dev/sdb1 /the/place/where/you/want/it/to/be
Make sure the whole mount point exists
